title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating burnt food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a husband eating burnt food in a dream The site has nothing to do with interpretations, but it is from one diligent scholar who seeks to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a husband eating burnt food in a dream If you see a husband eating burnt food, this may indicate that he has been betrayed or cheated by someone If you see your husband eating burnt food, this may indicate his inability to achieve his goals and aspirations, thanks to God. Seeing your wife eating burnt food in a dream may indicate some financial problems that he may face in his life during this period. A dream about eating burnt food may indicate At a wedding in a dream indicates some problems and crises that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband drinking from his wife in a dream This dream may indicate the difficulties and problems that her husband faced in his life during those days. This dream may indicate sad events The husband may suffer from it for some time. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s blood in a dream may mean the end of a difficult period that they have been suffering from in the past few days, thanks to God. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s blood in a dream may mean that he will feel relieved and relieve stress and tension during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of eating honey in a dream: It is possible that seeing your husband eating honey in a dream indicates that he is a righteous person who is close to God Almighty. If you see your husband eating honey in a dream, this may mean that a major problem and crisis will be overcome during these days. It may indicate Dreaming that the husband is eating honey in a dream indicates that he is going through some difficulties that he has been facing for a long time and that he will get rid of them. Seeing the husband eating honey in a dream may indicate his ample living and promotion at work, which is what the wife may get in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband smoking cigarettes in a dream: Seeing a husband eating cigarettes in a dream may indicate a job promotion that the husband may receive during this period. If one sees his husband’s cigarettes in a dream, this shows a lot about his ambitions and dreams in those days. It is possible that seeing A pair of cigarettes in a dream indicates good changes that will occur in their lives during this period. Seeing a wife smoking cigarettes in a dream may mean that she got rid of a problem and misfortune that she was facing in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating onions in a dreamIf you see a husband eating onions in a dream This may indicate the presence of envious and spiteful people in their lives. Dreaming that the husband is eating onions may indicate a lack of trust in those close to him during those days. It is possible to see that eating onions in a dream indicates neglect of prayer and lack of closeness to God Almighty. Seeing the husband Eating onions in a dream may indicate changes in the events occurring in their lives at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a man drinking a cup of coffee in a dream: This is a vision that could indicate the amount of large income and large expenses that the wife may receive during this period. title: Interpretation of seeing the deceased taking me with him in a dream

preview.html: The vision shows severe fatigue in the body, but it will heal in a short time, when the dreamer refuses to go with the dead. Seeing the deceased take the fortuneteller after eating with him and talking, this indicates overcoming the crises and problems that you face in life. It indicates a lot of sustenance and happy days. The vision shows The psychological harm that the dreamer is exposed to, but he will overcome this test and overcome it, and God knows best. Taking the dead to God in a dream shows closeness to God, obedience, and love of worship. It also indicates God’s grace to him for his good deeds and good deeds in this world and the hereafter. The dream may indicate patience and worthy qualities. With praise, good and deeds that please the Creator, the Almighty and the Most High, and abandoning any inappropriate action that one does and indicates a warning. Never sees the dead. He wants to take the fortuneteller with him, then this indicates travel and a feeling of confusion and anxiety in some matters of life, in which he was unable to make the appropriate decision. Then They walked together, talked, and sat for a while, but the dreamer did not go with him. This indicates that he overcame the crises and difficulties that almost killed him, but he fought and succeeded with his efforts. Interpretation of seeing a dead person driving a car in a dream: The vision here may indicate moving to another place or country. You may find a new job. Better, or moving to a new residence and house, and God knows best. Seeing a car in a dream is considered a means of salvation for the dreamer, saving him from the dangers that surround him. If he studies, he will complete his studies with distinction and be awarded certificates and high grades. Seeing a deceased person driving a car means engagement or marriage, and he may be in high demand. After working, your financial situation and wealth will improve within a few days. Interpretation of the vision of walking with the dead at night by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation that seeing talking with the dead in a dream indicates the good life of the dreamer among people in reality, and God knows best. Seeing the dead in the house at night indicates On his distance from God and the true religion and warning the dreamer to withdraw from what he is doing for sins or transgressions. When you see him walking with the dead at night, it announces that he is facing a financial crisis and crossing the strait for a short period, and God knows best. Seeing the dead person walking with me in a dream at night indicates his need for supplication and giving him alms. When you see A walk at night with a dead but unknown penguin. This indicates the difficulty of judgments and obstacles that the viewer goes through and which he cannot bear to overcome. But it hinders the path to reaching the struggle and its success. Umrah with a dead person in a dream is one of the good and good visions of the interpreters, which indicates a good ending for the dreamer. It announces a blessing in the dreamer’s life and the satisfaction of God Almighty. The dream indicates closeness to God and the dreamer’s good deeds, and that the person is loved on earth and among people with good behavior. Walking with the dead in a dream Seeing walking with a dead person in a dream means that he hears news that pleases his heart from a relative of his who is Realization of a great desire that he has been searching for for some time. It indicates goodness and abundance. It can show the extent of attachment and love for the deceased person. This is evidence of the love and justice of the afterlife, and the subconscious mind does this to remove the longing and see her and talk to her. The dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about theft for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about theft. Many wonder about the interpretation of a dream about theft for a pregnant and married woman, as this vision indicates many different and diverse things based on the condition and situation of the dreamer and the context of the dream itself. Interpretation of a dream about theft. Dream interpretation scholars have explained many different interpretations of one girl seeing theft. Some commentators say that the unmarried girl If she sees theft in her dream, this vision means the approaching date of her engagement. This vision may also indicate a change in her condition and a noticeable change in her condition. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she was robbed, then this vision indicates that there is a person who is absent from her and will return. Soon. If an unmarried woman sees a thief in her dream, this vision is a sign of a person who is asking for her hand and wants to marry her. Also, seeing a thief in a dream for a single woman may indicate that there is someone who wants to get close to her, it may be a friend, classmate, or work colleague. However, if an unmarried woman sees that someone has stolen something valuable from her, then this vision indicates that she is wasting her time playing and having fun, and she must be careful and vigilant. Seeing theft in a dream for an unmarried woman can also indicate that she is a girl who avoids her responsibilities and has many problems. Excuses for her post. Some scholars explain that if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream that she is being robbed and is sad, this vision may be a sign that this girl is experiencing some stress in her life. This vision may also indicate that this girl has had her heart stolen and has lost her feelings. With a bad man. Interpretation of a dream about theft in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about theft for an unmarried woman differs from the interpretation of a dream about theft for a married woman because the status and condition of an unmarried girl differs from that of a married woman and therefore the interpretation of the dream as well. From here, the interpretation of a dream about stealing for a married woman differs and can be identified as follows: Dream interpretation scholars and senior imams have explained that seeing a married woman stealing in her dream means that her due date is approaching if she is pregnant, or that she will become pregnant soon if she wants to have children. Seeing theft in a married woman’s dream It may mean that there is a woman who wants to steal her husband. But if a married woman sees in her dream that one of her sons is stealing, then this vision is evidence of an evaluation of this son’s behavior and the need to monitor him and his actions. If a married woman sees in her dream that something has been stolen from her, then she should pay attention and take care of this. The matter. Various interpreters say that if a married woman sees in her dream that her gold has been stolen, then this vision is considered a sign of the deterioration of her married life and the existence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about theft in a dream for a pregnant woman. Many dream interpretation scholars have interpreted the vision of theft in a woman’s dream. Pregnant as an unwanted vision. Therefore, the interpretation of a dream about theft in a pregnant woman’s dream can be determined as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has been robbed, then this vision may indicate that she will be exposed to exhaustion and

title: Interpretation of seeing a house falling in a dream in detail

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a house falling in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “O leaders, consult me ​​regarding my vision if you wish to express a vision” (43). These dreams have certain repercussions, and they are good visions whose circumstances are known, and they may not be interpreted, and only the talk of the devil’s spirit, then in the encyclopedia we provide the interpretation of the dream of demolishing a house. Follow us. The house that falls in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a collapsed house. If a person sees in a dream that the whole house or part of it has been demolished. It is good news for him that he will soon have a lot of money. However, if he sees in a dream that he is demolishing the house of an acquaintance. This vision expresses that the dreamer will receive money from this person. Dream of part of the house falling. It indicates that the dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty with money that will save him from hardship and hardship. If one sees in a dream that the house has collapsed due to the presence of torrential water. This vision is one of the unpleasant visions that portends the death of one of the members of this house. If a person dreams that the roof of the house is collapsing by jumping on the roof of the house, then he is ruined. This vision is a warning of the death of the dreamer’s wife or husband. If a person sees himself jumping and breaking the roof of the house. This vision is one of the unpleasant dreams that indicates the death of one of the members of this house. If he sees himself demolishing and demolishing the house in which he resides. This vision expresses that this person will face a major financial crisis in the future and that he will suffer from many problems that are difficult to solve. Interpretation of a dream about a building collapsing: Whoever sees in his dream the collapse of an entire building or an entire building. It is an undesirable vision that indicates that the dreamer will fall into many financial crises in the coming period. But if the person who owns an entire building actually sees part of it collapsing in the dream. This vision expresses the death of a loved one or the death of a loved one and that this person will enter a period of sadness and severe depression as a result. A person sees in a dream that a building is located before his eyes. Among the unpleasant visions that warn him that he will fail to achieve his dreams and that the plans he makes for his future are not good plans. Interpretation of a dream about a house wall collapsing: If someone sees in a dream that he is demolishing the wall of the house. This vision expresses the strong leadership personality that this person possesses and can overcome all the difficulties and problems that hinder him in his life. It is good for the owner of the vision to reach a high position in society and that he will reach a high rank. Location: If a person sees in a dream the collapse of all the walls of the house. This vision symbolizes that this house is full of many problems, but the dreamer will be able to skillfully get rid of all the existing problems. But if one sees in a dream that the walls of his house have been completely demolished, but without injuries or wounds. This vision indicates that this dreamer will receive a lot of good news that will sweep his life as soon as he gets rid of the setbacks and many sorrows that he experienced. The house falling on his family. If a person sees in a dream that the house is falling on him and his family, then this is good news for him of the arrival of goodness. Abundance, abundance of sustenance and happiness

title: Interpretation of a dream about sitting with the dead and talking to him

preview.html: If the deceased warns the dreamer or the dreamer argues or tries to warn the dreamer about something, then the dreamer should take this dream seriously, because this message is a clear message from him about an important matter that needs to be conveyed to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about sitting with the dead and talking to him in a dream about a girl Unmarried: If an unmarried woman dreams that the deceased was talking to her about her life and about her personal matters. Here it indicates a clear message that the dreamer sent to the single girl who is dreaming. The unmarried girl who sits and talks with the dead in a dream for a long time. This is an indication that she has done many things. What the dead person asked of her in life, and that she is in the abode of truth, and the hadith is authentic. And the unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she refuses to sit and talk with the dead person. This is an indication of her escaping from something real in her life and her attachment to whoever follows it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the unmarried woman In the dream, she looks at the dead person while he is talking to her, and she does not believe him in the dream. Here it appears that she made a big mistake in her life and she must come back from this matter, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a person dying and crying over him. Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting with the dead and talking to him in a dream About a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is sitting with the deceased for a long time. This is an indication that the deceased misses this married woman and must visit him at this time. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at the dead man in a dream, then he is also sitting and talking to her. This is a sign. To do all the things that the dreamer asked of her in the dream. And the married woman who refuses in the dream to listen to the dead man’s conversation while she is sitting with him. Here it explains that she will suffer from something very important in her life during this time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And seeing a married woman talking to the dead during Her service. Indicates the truth of his words, and she must take his words seriously in her life and act accordingly. Interpretation of a dream of sitting with the dead and talking to him in a dream about a divorced woman. As a divorced woman sees the dead person sitting together and talking about her marriage to another person. This is an indication of her agreement to marry this person. The person and that this matter is in her interest. And the divorced woman who sees that she does not want to hear the words of the dead person in a dream. It appears that she wants to pursue many wrong actions and bad things in her life. What if the dead man came in a dream and spoke to the divorced woman and warned her about an important issue in her life? She must be very careful during this period and pay great attention to herself, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. And the divorced woman who looks at the dead in a dream and sits with them for a long time. This is an indication that the dead person longs for the divorced woman, and he must visit him later. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person. Kissing the living. Interpretation of the vision of sitting with the dead and talking to him in a dream. About the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting with the dead and talking to him. It indicates that there are many concerns occupying the mind of this dreamer at this time in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if the dreamer looks at the deceased Try

It indicates that there are many concerns occupying the mind of this dreamer at this time in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if the dreamer looks at the deceased Try

title: Interpretation of trees in a dream by Ibn Sirin: I saw a tree in a dream

preview.html: A dream about trees for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, or fruit trees to cut down the green tree by Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen and others. Interpretation of the tree in a dream. Trees: their number is known, and they are human, and their position among humans is what a tree is among trees, and if he sees that he is making something from it, then People practice it on the essence of the tree and its benefits. If he sees palm trees around him, then he has men to that extent, if the palm trees are in a place where there are hardly any palm trees, and if it is like an orchard. Or land suitable for it, so a group of palm trees is a node for whoever owns it. Its fruits, they are men of money, or knot money, and men are honor, and noble knots, according to what you described of the condition of the palms and their height over trees in fruitfulness and benefits. Tree If you dream of seeing trees with new and green leaves, this portends a happy ending and the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Seeing dead trees portends sadness and loss. If you climb a tree, it means that you will be promoted and quickly rise to the highest positions. If you cut down a tree or uproot it, this portends wasting energy and money in vain. Whoever sees in the house of a tree of unknown origin that fire has gathered or it is a house of fire, according to the Almighty’s saying: “He made you fire from the green trees.” Perhaps the tree in the house or in the market causes a dispute between people, if the tree is unknown, because God Almighty says: “They will make you judge in all your disputes among themselves.” As for large trees that do not have fruits, such as cypress and sycamore, they are strong and large trees with no goodness in them, and there are no trees with good air. Its fruits are in accelerating its realization and benefits. A tree that has thorns is a difficult man, and whoever takes water from a tree will benefit from a man attributed to the type of that tree, and whoever sees that he is planting a tree in his garden, he will give birth to a boy. Children whose ages are as old and young as the age of these trees, and if he sees the trees growing and with two winds during their period, then they are men who enter this place to cry, worry, and be crowded. The commentators said: If the tree shows the work of its owner, his religion, and his spirit, then its leaves indicate his character and the beauty of his clothing, and its people show His lineage, brothers, and beliefs. His heart shows her his hidden secrets and deeds, his skin shows her appearance and his skin and everything that adorns him with his works, and the water shows her faith and piety and his kingdom and the life of every person according to what is his. Fate, and perhaps they arranged for them contrary to this arrangement, and I mentioned it to the sailor. Whoever sees himself on top of a tree or his property in a dream or sees him, look at his condition and the condition of his tree. He is in torment, and perhaps it is the tree of Zaqm that became due to his disbelief or the corruption of his taste. He went to one of two subjects according to his fate and the value of his tree, and if he was alive and in good health, then I looked at his condition, whether he was a man asking for marriage, or a woman for a wife, one of them got a husband according to The condition and shape of the tree if it is unknown, or according to the nature of its nature, origin and essence if it is known. Then she looks at the time at that time, and if that tree that she had or saw herself from above recently had water flowing into it, then the sick person will be healthy, and his body will be healthy

title: Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law's wedding

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s brother’s wedding in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about my husband’s brother’s wedding in a dream. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but they want to know an interpretation. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines. These are the interpretations of some working scholars, not authorities. The site does not interfere in interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law’s wedding in a dream: The joy of the husband’s brother in a dream may indicate that the woman is pregnant with a child, and God knows best. If a woman sees her sister’s husband getting married, this may indicate kinship and love between them. This vision also It can indicate positive changes occurring in their lives during this time, and God knows best. If one sees his brother getting married in a dream, this may indicate that the man is very close to his brother and that the relationship between them will improve, thanks to God. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s wife wearing my clothes in a dream. If A woman saw that her sister-in-law was wearing her clothes in a dream. This may indicate the strength of the relationship between them, thanks to God. If a woman saw that her sister-in-law was wearing her clothes, this may indicate the friendship and love that existed between them at that time. This vision may also indicate that her husband’s sister was wearing her clothes. It indicates the comprehensive diet that a woman may have in those days, and God knows best. This vision may indicate the abundance of money and food that a woman can obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of my sister-in-law’s dream of cleaning my house in a dream: Seeing my husband’s sister cleaning the house In a dream, it may mean that one will receive great help from her during this time, and God knows best. A dream about one’s sister-in-law cleaning the house in a dream may indicate that relations between them improved a lot during that period. If one sees one’s sister-in-law cleaning the house in a dream, this may indicate A woman may obtain a large amount of livelihood during this period, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister was cleaning the house, this may indicate good events that may occur in her life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s sister’s dream of cutting hair My Hair in a Dream Seeing her husband’s sister cutting her hair in a dream may indicate many changes in her life in those days, and God knows best. If a woman sees her husband’s sister cutting her hair, this may indicate that a lot of effort will be made to improve relations between them in those days. It may also indicate that This vision indicates great material gains that a woman may obtain in those days. Seeing my husband’s sister cutting her hair in a dream may indicate a change in events that may happen to her during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s sister reconciling with me in a dream: Seeing my husband’s sister reconciling With the wife in a dream, it may mean that things will calm down and circumstances between them will calm down thanks to God. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister is reconciling with her in a dream, this may indicate the end of problems and differences between them. This vision can also indicate changing events that are occurring in Their lives during the coming period. In the case of dreaming of the husband’s sister who reconciled with the woman in the dream, yum

title: Interpretation of seeing the groom in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the groom in a dream: There is a large section that is convinced that seeing the groom in a dream for a man and a woman is good news. In fact, Imam Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin proved that this dream has some interpretations that are not good at all.Interpretation of seeing the groom in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the groom in a dream by Ibn ShaheenThe interpretations of the scholar Ibn Shaheen differed in the interpretation of this dream and its cause, as each dream and dream contains different details and according to this interpretation Different: Ibn Sirin interpreted the married woman who sees the groom in her dream, meaning that bad things will happen to her in her life to change and become better, and the interpretation of the single girl who sees the groom coming to propose to her, and she was. She is happy that she will soon marry a person of good reputation and morals. However, if the girl does not feel happy and there are drums around her, the interpretation for that is that the girl has gone through a series of successive problems. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing the groom in her dream. Most interpretations of an unmarried girl’s dream are good and all of them It portends good things that will happen to her in the near or future: Seeing a groom with a smile on his face suggests that he will get married or that something good will happen to her, whether work or money. If the proposed groom in a dream is someone whom the girl loves in reality, then this is a warning of financial crises and problems or In her work.Interpretation of a dream about an unknown groom in an unmarried girl’s dream is someone she does not know in reality. Its interpretation is that he feels the need to communicate and that he feels a great void emotionally. See also: Backgrounds in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a son-in-law in a dream by Imam NabulsiIt is known that the scholar Imam Ibn al-Nabulsi is one of the most famous figures in all of history. He is famous for his interpretation of dreams based on the general rules of interpretation: If If the groom is in a dream, his features are blurred and he proceeds to propose to the girl, then this is a warning that this girl will soon fall into serious difficulties. The girl’s face was smiling and the person who proposed in the dream was someone she knew in reality. It is news about good things that will happen and that her life will change and become a new life full of happiness and joy. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which I saw a groom proposing to my sister. This dream is considered one of The most beautiful dreams, especially in terms of the dream itself and its interpretations, all of which represent happiness and goodness for the sister: If the brother sees the groom approaching his sister in a dream, the interpretation of this is that his sister will get a share of great happiness, and it is not just happiness, but a special happiness that will change her life. From all sides. But if the sister is already married and her brother sees that there is a groom suiting her, then the interpretation of this dream is that goodness and blessing are her share, and not only that, but the largest part is the brother’s share. Or the person who saw the dream. Regarding the interpretation of seeing a groom proposing to a sister in a brother’s dream, it means that that brother’s sister is very accomplished in her studies and is also among those who are successful at work. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of wedding symbols

preview.html: Dreams that indicate an imminent pregnancy: A married woman’s vision of milk coming out of her breast in her dream is considered one of the good visions that indicate that her pregnancy is approaching. If a married woman dreams that she is slaughtering a sacrifice or cattle, this is great evidence that her pregnancy is approaching. If a married woman dreams that she is eating meat Camels, this is evidence that her pregnancy is approaching, in addition to the fact that the newborn is nice to her and his father. Some dream interpreters also see that seeing gold in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of her pregnancy, and seeing gold and jewelry in a dream is a promising vision. Others also see that when A married woman sees her hair growing longer or longer than usual in a dream, then this is a sign of her imminent pregnancy and also promises good news about the coming life and goodness. As for seeing coins, there are two sides to it, the first side says that pregnancy and goodness are near, and the other side claims that seeing A married woman seeing coins in her dream is evidence of an important discovery about a religion, and God knows best. Signs that indicate an imminent pregnancy. There are many symbols that, if they appear in a dream, many dream interpreters believe that they indicate the approaching date of pregnancy for a married woman, and among these symbols are: Next. If a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing new clothes, new shoes, or new socks, these are all signs of approaching pregnancy. If a married woman has been impatiently waiting for the news of her pregnancy for a long time and sees heavy rain in her dream, then this is evidence of the approaching pregnancy. If a married woman has been waiting for pregnancy for a long time and sees in her dream that she is buying a teapot, this indicates that pregnancy is imminent, according to some dream interpreters. Some dream interpreters believe that if a married woman dreams that she is buying eggs, this means that pregnancy is imminent and they explain Also, if she can identify the type of eggs she is buying, and if they are white eggs, this indicates that the baby's gender is male. However, if the color of the eggs is red, this indicates that the newborn is a female, “and God Almighty knows.” There are also many visions that do not need interpreters in dreams, so that a married woman can be sure that the meaning of her vision indicates an imminent pregnancy, such as a married woman seeing herself breastfeeding. A child, and this does not need much interpretation, because it is said that the new baby will be of the same gender as the child he dreamed of in the dream. As for seeing chocolate in a dream, whether it is liquid or solid in its various forms, whether you cook with it, eat it, or buy it, it indicates... Pregnancy and goodness are approaching, “God willing.” If a woman dreams in her dream that she gave her daughter a gift or money in her dream, according to some commentators, this indicates that the daughter will become pregnant. If the woman is married, God was taking her to carry her pregnancy for a long time, and she saw in her dream that she She saw the moon or was waiting for it to rise, and a bright moon came out, this indicates that the time of pregnancy is near, “God willing.” Ahh

title: Interpretation of olives in a dream: Eating black or green olives in a dream

preview.html: A dream about olives indicates great livelihood and other interpretations that we will interpret for an unmarried girl and a married woman for a pregnant woman in the area for a man, such as buying black olives, eating green olives, and drinking olive oil according to Ibn Sirin. And more in the continuation of the topic: Seeing olives in a dream is a praiseworthy vision. If a person sees in his dream that he is planting olive trees in a wide, fertile land with a lot of water, then this is evidence of goodness and livelihood for this person. Interpretation of olives in a dream Olives in a dream generally indicate food and that the dreamer earns money through labor. And the sweat on his forehead, and if it is black, this indicates a little goodness, and if it is green, it symbolizes a lot of good things. Seeing olives in a dream means an abundance of money, and if he sees olives in a dream complete, this is evidence that he is useful to his family and helps them. It is sometimes said that an olive tree in a dream means an honorable woman or one person’s guardianship over another person. If the olives are yellow in a dream, this is evidence of his fears for religion that the dreamer will face. On the other hand, the dreamer picking olives from an olive tree has achieved success in his life. Olives are sometimes interpreted to mean that they are for those who see them, but if the dreamer eats them, it is a blessing for him. A livelihood full of olives in a dream indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by good people, and the fruit of olives indicates blessings and pleasure. Whoever picks olives in a dream will be miserable in life and bored if he presses on them. But if he is poor, the olive announces to him the money that will come to him. Black olives in a dream are food and money, and yellow olives are anxiety, problems, and diseases. Olive is a man who is useful to his family, or a very pure woman. As for the olive leaf, it is interpreted as peace and good news. The olive fruit indicates easy nutrition and absolute pleasure, and olives or olive oil in a patient’s dream is a treatment. Interpretation of olives in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Olives in a dream indicate many meanings and symbols, which differ depending on the dreamer’s condition, whether she is married or single, just as seeing olives differs from seeing olives in a dream. Seeing olive trees, seeing the oil extracted from olives as well. Today's topic we will learn the interpretation of seeing olives in a dream. Interpreters, including the respected Sheikh Ibn Shirin, believe that seeing olives in a dream is one of the most promising visions, especially in the case of planting olives, buying, or sitting under their trees. Interpreters also believe that seeing olives and trees planted on the ground symbolizes the fulfillment of desires and is one of the desired visions. And worthy of praise in the dreamer’s dream. Also, seeing collecting olives in a dream indicates the success, profit, and livelihood that the dreamer will enjoy in his life, God willing. In the evil of seeing olives in a dream, seeing eating bad-tasting olives in a dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many... Of the problems that affect his psychological and financial situation. It indicates the difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life. As for olives in a sick man’s dream, they are a sign of his speedy recovery, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing.

Olives in a dream indicate many meanings and symbols, which differ depending on the dreamer’s condition, whether she is married or single, just as seeing olives differs from seeing olives in a dream. Seeing olive trees, seeing the oil extracted from olives as well. Today's topic we will learn the interpretation of seeing olives in a dream. Interpreters, including the respected Sheikh Ibn Shirin, believe that seeing olives in a dream is one of the most promising visions, especially in the case of planting olives, buying, or sitting under their trees. Interpreters also believe that seeing olives and trees planted on the ground symbolizes the fulfillment of desires and is one of the desired visions. And worthy of praise in the dreamer’s dream. Also, seeing collecting olives in a dream indicates the success, profit, and livelihood that the dreamer will enjoy in his life, God willing. In the evil of seeing olives in a dream, seeing eating bad-tasting olives in a dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many... Of the problems that affect his psychological and financial situation. It indicates the difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life. As for olives in a sick man’s dream, they are a sign of his speedy recovery, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing.
